page.title: 14Law and Order in Uxbridge
page.content: The crime rate in Uxbridge is going down.A recent article in the Gazette said that the crime rate had improved by 23%.The Police have encouraged people to look after their property better by securing their homes more carefully.The Neighbourhood Watch Scheme has encouraged a community spirit to fight crime.The Substance Abuse Unit has been set up to help people suffering from drug and substance addiction,which can lead to crime.The nearest police station is in Windsor Street.There is a County Court and a Magistrates court in our area.On the RAF camp the Ministry of Defence police keep order.Security is very strict on the camp and all visitors in cars must report to the main gate on arrival.
